EmailTemplate.name: Joe - Going to VMworld this year? (1501682619.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Joe - Going to VMworld this year? (1501682619.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Joe - Are you going to be going to VMworld 2017 out in Las Vegas? My team and I are hosting a dinner on Tuesday the 29th at Charlie Palmer’s Steak House and we would love it if you could join. Let me know if you’d like to join us for some steak! Best, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
